animalData.name: Red Panda
animalData.description: The red panda, also known as the lesser panda, is a small mammal native to the eastern Himalayas and southwestern China.

animalData.name: Pangolia
animalData.description: Pangolins, sometimes known as scaly anteaters, are mammals of the order Pholidota

animalData.name: Mantis Shrimp
animalData.description: Mantis shrimp are carnivorous marine crustaceans of the order Stomatopoda.

animalData.name: Gibbon
animalData.description: Gibbons are apes in the family Hylobatidae. The family historically contained one genus, but now is split into four extant genera and 20 species.

animalData.name: Wombat
animalData.description: Wombats are short-legged, muscular quadrupedal marsupials of the family Vombatidae that are native to Australia.
